name: Platinum Aviation
about: Platinum Aviation, now operating in multiple locations, is a premier flight training center dedicated to providing top-notch aviation education. In Utah, Platinum Aviation is based at Spanish Fork Airport and South Valley Regional Airport, offering FAR Part 61 training and a diverse fleet for rental and instructional flights. Students must demonstrate proficiency through a Check-Out flight to rent aircraft. In South Florida, Platinum Aviation focuses on training with the latest, best-equipped aircraft, catering to those seeking advanced flight skills. With a commitment to safety and excellence, Platinum Aviation helps aspiring pilots achieve their dreams of flying. Join us to start your aviation journey today.
services:
["Ground School
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
